org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm

Interface TasmParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TasmFileParser

    public interface TasmParser
    TasmParser is an interface that will parse a TIGR Assembler (tasm) formatted structure and call the appropriate visit methods on the given TasmVisitor.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canParse()
      Can this handler accept new visit requests via parse() calls.
      void parse(TasmVisitor visitor)
      Parse the tasm structure starting from the beginning and call the appropriate visit methods on the given TasmVisitor.
      void parse(TasmVisitor visitor, TasmVisitor.TasmVisitorCallback.TasmVisitorMemento memento)
      Parse the tasm structure starting from location provided by the TasmVisitor.TasmVisitorCallback.TasmVisitorMemento and call the appropriate visit methods on the given TasmVisitor.

    • Method Detail

      • canParse

        boolean canParse()
        Can this handler accept new visit requests via parse() calls. Some implementations of TasmParser may only allow one parse call in its lifetime (for example, if the tasm structure is being parsed via an InputStream).
        Returns:
        true if this handler can handle new parse requests; false otherwise.

      • parse

        void parse(TasmVisitor visitor)
    throws IOException
        Parse the tasm structure starting from the beginning and call the appropriate visit methods on the given TasmVisitor.
        Parameters:
        visitor - the TasmVisitor instance to call visit methods on; can not be null;
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem parsing the tasm.
        NullPointerException - if visitor is null.
        IllegalStateException - if this handler can not accept any new parse requests.
        See Also:
        canParse()

      • parse

        void parse(TasmVisitor visitor,
           TasmVisitor.TasmVisitorCallback.TasmVisitorMemento memento)
    throws IOException
        Parse the tasm structure starting from location provided by the TasmVisitor.TasmVisitorCallback.TasmVisitorMemento and call the appropriate visit methods on the given TasmVisitor.
        Parameters:
        visitor - the TasmVisitor instance to call visit methods on; can not be null;
        memento - the TasmVisitor.TasmVisitorCallback.TasmVisitorMemento instance to tell the parser where to start parsing from; can not be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem parsing the tasm file.
        NullPointerException - if either the visitor or memento are null.
        UnsupportedOperationException - if mementos are not supported by this parser implementation for example when parsing an InputStream instead of a File.
        IllegalStateException - if this handler can not accept any new parse requests.
        See Also:
        canParse()
